extendedInfo.description: Just got a new phone? Want your old phoneâs contacts and messages in it? Need to backup your phone? Then this is the application you are looking for. It is able to completely transfer your phonebook and messages from almost any phone to your Android or from Android to any other phone. We spent years developing a product with the ability to migrate between thousands of models from all manufacturers including Nokia, Samsung, Motorola, Sony Ericsson, LG, HTC, Blackberry, Apple iPhone and many more. You can download a similar application for iPhone from the App Store.You can copy data directly from phone to phone using our secure Internet Storage or connect the phone to your PC using the MOBILedit software for Windows. MOBILedit is also the ultimate PC suite for all Android phones with features including an organizer, rich phonebook functionality, smart phonebook optimizer,  battery life indicator, signal indicator, memory status, SMS sending and management and much more.This extensive project and our unique know-how is used by millions of mobile phone users as well as large corporations.  It is also the gold standard in the world of digital forensics investigation with customers including the FBI, MI5, US NAVY. Download this PC application at www.mobiledit.com.The Phone Copier also provides phone BACKUP and RESTORE of this data to your memory card: phonebook, SMS messages , phone settings,  call logs, bookmarks, search history, and carrier information.Our Internet storage provides a safe way to upload, store or download your phonebook and SMS messages to a new phone. The communication is encrypted in the same way as the most secure internet banking.Just follow these steps:1. Download and run the application on both phones (iPhone version has the name "MOBILedit").2. Create an Internet Storage account with just a few clicks.3. Start phone to phone copying.Or1. Download MOBILedit to your PC from www.mobiledit.com2. Connect your phone using a cable or Wi-Fi and start uploading or downloading your phone content to/from Internet Storage . You also can transfer your phone content directly without an Internet connection.!IMPORTANT NOTE!It is recommended to backup and restore the same phone models with the same system versions. Due to the Android architecture it is not possible to universally transfer native backup files. For migrating please use the Upload/Download functions.If application crashes with "Out of memory"  during restore, close all other applications (some applications can only be suspended, but still using memory) or restart the device and restore again.

reviews.title: LG G2x ----> Samsung S4
reviews.comment: Great app, super fast and easy to use considering I\'ve never used Bluetooth before. 5 stars!
reviews.author: jakob medina

reviews.title: Imported contacts from Nokia C2-01
reviews.comment: App that does its Job! Used it on my Nokia C2-01 to import into Google Nexus 4. More than 800 of my contacts imported without any spillage ....well under 5 minutes. I\'m Pleased!
